price: Yoo isaan kan injifatan ta’an, Saahiroota (falfaltoota) hordofuun keenya ni kajeelamaa.”
arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: laʿallanā nattabiʿu al-saḥarata in kānū humu al-ghālibīna
